Hahhahaha. I found a way to beat the glitch. Using another glitch.

Okay, so certain maps make my system lock up right?

My solution is this- rename the offending map files, so that the game crashes itself with a cannot read file error on attempting to load them.

Then instead aces.exe is launched instead of the patcher, that way it doesn't complain about the 'missing' files.

Like that if I get a map that would lock up my system, the game crashes itself cleanly without affecting my other stuff. And should they fix the bug, all I have to do is change the name back.
